title: [Large-Scale] Student-Centered 8th-Grade Mathematics Textbook Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of primary and secondary curriculum development and textbook design
context.additional_context: Enhancing student-centered textbook design capabilities for current math teachers and education specialists

learning_goals: Apply the seven categories of student-centered approaches (e.g., fostering learning environments, enhancing creativity) to actual textbook design
An analytical tool can be utilized to assess the level of student-centeredness in existing textbooks
A design plan for mathematics activities reflecting students' prior knowledge can be proposed
A strategy for establishing a digital-based interactive learning environment can be developed
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
